website_summaries.verdict: A unique lawn-mowing option from Sun Joe that does away with the need for fuel or electricity.
pros: Simple push design glides over the yard while cutting the grass
Manual pushing is easy through most yards and grass types
Base is stable and turns quickly
cons: Pushing the mower around can be difficult in thick and overgrown grass

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My yard slopes, it has rabbit holes, is uneven, has a few twigs and the grass was over a foot high. After asking the men in my family to use the gas mower to mow the lawn, I got frustrated brought the Sun Joe mower and did it myself. I am not mechanically inclined. It was very easy to put together. It did get stuck on a few twigs which were easy to clear. Most annoying was the grass catcher, it filled fast and if not emptied feeds back into the mower and jammed it, again even that was easy to clear. Overall the Sun Joe did an excellent job and I got a really good work out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. My 8 & 10 year old use it on our quarter of an acre back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Cloe Doctor Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: but this one is so nice. Lighter weight and has the bag attachment
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned a push mower before, but this one is so nice. Lighter weight and has the bag attachment. Our son wanted to start mowing this year to earn money, so this is a good one for him to start with. It requires a lot of push through thicker grass, but it cut it in 2 passes. Our son will be sure to keep up on the mowing so he doesn’t wear himself out like he did last night. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Janell (Mom)

customer_reviews.title: so far my best reel mower
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. the bag stays on well on the 18 inch mower. note there is a difference from the 18 inch and the smaller ones. the 18 inch bag catches almost all of the clippings. its makes it super easy for compost. This has become my go to reel mower. nice to have around for that quick little trim.
customer_reviews.author: Norby

customer_reviews.title: very well built mower
customer_reviews.text: I finally put this mower together yesterday and mowed my perennial Rye grass lawn. The results were outstanding it's a very wide cut and very clean. Also, this device is not hard to push at all which was my main concern. I am very impressed with this product and the grass catcher works great. If you have winter grass like Rye grass, then this more is a must. It also works very well for bermudagrass.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: This thing is not good. Avoid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry guys even for small patches of grass this thing is flimsy and difficult to work with. You will spend more time playing around with tension, height, and it constantly getting clogged or the wheels locking with a low level of grass the cut. Was trying to get a product that would be easy for a small patch of grass vs buying a full on gas mower. I wouldn't recommend if you are looking for an EASY grass cutting experience
customer_reviews.author: SecOps

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to push and move around. The blades are very sharp and cuts the grass easily. The grass catcher is a really nice feature so you don't have to rake up anything.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Burns calories, not gas. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting this to work as smoothly as a gas powered mower, you will be disappointed... but I got this because, if I have to have an expanse of water wasting plants that don't bear anything useful, I don't want to also burn gas to maintain it. And, having some experience with push powered mixers, this works so much better than I expected. I guess having a lawn is not so bad, since it helps me build my compost pile.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to use because I am bo longer able to mow. I love that it's quiet so we don't have to worry about waking the neighbors. Pro: 10+ age can push it without too much effort. It's super easy to put together. 10 mins Max! So long as the grass isn't too tall, it cuts wonderfully. Just make sure area is free of rocks and sticks. Con: getting the tension just right against the blade took a long time. It was frustrating. I don't use the grass catcher that came with it but I like the option.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna H.

customer_reviews.title: Putting it on the curb with a "FREE" sign
customer_reviews.text: This is my second attempt to use the mower. After delivery I tried once, adjusting blade distance and reel height in multiple combinations without success, then hired a gardener. Now giving it a second chance, still cuts spotty and sticks and stops not allowing me to complete even one pass of a 4-6 ft strip. Multiple passes are required to even cut half the blades. I wish I could return it. Itd going on the curb with a "Free" sign. Not buying my next mower from Amazon where a large return is difficult. All around awful purchase. (Bonus with prchase: bruised ribs!)
customer_reviews.author: JG still kicking

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to Like this more!
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like about this: 1. The hight adjustment of mowing deck. Even at the highest adjustment it cuts too low. This causes bare spots in lawn. 2. It is hard to push through thick spots of grass. This may be fine if your intent is to get rid of your gym membership. 3. It does not cut even. It misses may blades of grass so I have to go over my lawn 3-4 times and then finish with a weed wacker to make it look presentable. 4. It makes way more noise than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rick E., San Clemente CA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.... great value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I have a small flat yard so it works well. On uneven terrain it might be a problem... but so might any other mover. The bag is good. I don't have any problem with it falling off. Overall, it is exactly what I was expecting.... a great value that does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Olliver

customer_reviews.title: Worked until it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Have had less than two months. Rear wheel fell off. No assistance on how to replace. No sooner figured out how to repair wheel and got it working again when the handle snapped apart above one of the bolts holding it on. Definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tckaczmarek

customer_reviews.title: My first reel mower and my 5 star experience.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever reel lawn mower and I love mowing with it. Using a manual push reel mower requires effort from the operator. Check to see the recommend height that your lawn should be mowed on before purchasing a reel mower. Some grass types should be cut at higher heights that most reel mower settings offer. This tool provides a clean cut to the grass blades and is most effective when used more frequently on your lawn. “Cons” Challenging to get a clean cut around obstacles. Harder to push through tall/thick grass. When my grass was too thick I would use my rotary mower first, then do a second pass with my reel mower.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Only to be used for a small front lawn
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to assemble, then disasemble and return Cons: Cannot be used to mow a backyard in a tupical one family house. Jams with grass every 4 to 5 feet of cutting, the grass catcher is unable to hold more than a couple handful of grass before spilling over. Requires a strong force to push forward after its jammed with grass. Note: did attempt to adjust height and blade position, did not resolve the jamming issue when cutting the back lawn. If you have a small front lawn, this can do but not the way its portrayed in the video commercial.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Not As Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this so much since it reminded me of the old days. I found this hard to maneuver especially when grass is slightly thick or high. It also cannot cut weeds that grows in different directions. You have to keep going over the lawn over and over in different direction for it to cut as much as you want. However, even after doing so, you can still see the grass or weeds that it couldn't cut, leaving uneven lawn.
customer_reviews.author: «ôiô»

customer_reviews.title: My first time cutting grass and I couldn't be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: My first time cutting grass and I couldn't be happier with this product. I needed some muscle to get the handles attached to the base, but other than that perfect.
customer_reviews.author: N. Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Does a decent job, even in tall grass
customer_reviews.text: Had a week infested, overgrown lawn that had not been mowed for a long time due to recurring rain storms. Decided to buy this mower. It was very easy to assemble. Best for: Small yards, since it is not self-propelled. Pluses: (1) Efficiently mowed most tall grass (left a few stubborn tall weeds, (2) Relatively easy to propel, (3) Stores nicely with a small footprint, (4) Rear basket catches most of the lawn trimmings. Minuses: (1) Catcher basket easily slips off and needs to be be reattached, (1) Does not cut well along the edge of the grass (although in fairness, it is not intended to be an edger).
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Need a hard workout? For the fittest of people only.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to push even for a 53 year old fit man. Blades cut irregularly even at different heights leaving long patches. Conditions: Green grass about 3.5” long.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: The product was incredibly easy to put together. I think it actually cuts better than most mowers. After using this I was comparing the lawn to grass at the gold course. It does a great job and it is a little bit of a workout for me on the hills. Mr. Joe
customer_reviews.author: Mr Joe

customer_reviews.title: Does not cut grass well at all
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to calibrate with the pieces of paper included in the box They provide strips of paper that you used to calibrate the blades. We were able to calibrate only one side to get the blades to cut the paper. there was no way to calibrate the blades so it cut the paper on both the left and right side of the mower. It constantly clogs up. I even tried cutting our new sod with the highest setting and then working our way down on the settings. It still got clogged up. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Great for price.
customer_reviews.text: Just got my mower delivered. I'm very new to the reel mower game, I've always had gas mowers. My fiance and I just bought our first house and the lawn hadn't been mowed for probably 3 ish weeks. I started out on the highest setting and didn't have a single problem. It cut exceptionally well, did not take much effort to push and was super quiet. My the onebcomplaint I did have is that I would like the handle to be adjustable but be albe to be left in a fixed position. I'll update after a few more cuts but as of now I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Poor workmanship, I notice the lock mechanism for the cut height would not stay in place after a couple of turns. I look at it and found the nut and bolt for the wheel shaft where not properly tight and where becoming loose. The location was not easy accesible to fix without undoing the original assembly so decided to return the item. It's a shame as it was easy to put toghter but not what I expected of wormaship for the pre assemble parts
customer_reviews.author: Christian Marquez Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Reel Mower experience
customer_reviews.text: Great Reel Mower, I have kennel area that was a pain. Folding the handle on my lawnmower down, lifting it to go through a small opening, unfolding the handle was rough. This Reel Mower is easy to get in and out. Great cut, not hard to push. It makes the job less stressful, in and out in a short time. It is fun to use, may let my battery powered mower rest and use the Reel Mower to trim before getting the lawn tractor out. Very solid and well built also. Also love the grass catcher, so much rain in Georgia grass grows fast. Enjoy if you by one!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel came off after four uses! And where the blades meet the cutting bar it squeaks terribly unless you grease it every time. It broke just in time for me to have thrown out the packaging. Negative stars!
customer_reviews.author: HappyGo...

customer_reviews.title: Nice mower
customer_reviews.text: The first one was badly damaged but the SunJoe customer service was very good. They sent me a new one within a week and gave me 45 days to return the damaged mower. I use this to cut a small patch of alfalfa, grass, and clover and I feed the trimmings to my chickens. It cuts very nicely like a reel mower should. My only dislike is that the bag only catches about 2/3 of the trimmings so that means less food for my chickens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: It cuts some grass well but wont cut through some thicker pieces or dandelions. As well the worst part is we have tiny twigs in are ward that even the smallest of twigs this would get stopped in its tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Travis

customer_reviews.title: It’s the “reel” deal...
customer_reviews.text: Over all, a great product for the money invested. I would buy this again. The ONLY thing is: watch out for thick patches in your lawn... lol... it’s a “reel” fast way to look like a crazy guy cutting his lawn. The blade gets stuck and your stomach meets the handle bar. BUT AGAIN... over all- I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: this is a great little mower
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are a little wide and sit wide from the blade (so the cut isn't as close to the fence/cement slab as I'd like). That said, for the money (and the small area I have to mow), this is a great little mower.
customer_reviews.author: ScottW_KSU

customer_reviews.title: Recommend small electric lawn mowers
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would work... and I was disappointed. After a few uses, it was becoming too difficult to push and on top of that it leaves a lot of grass pieces everywhere on the ground and not in the grass catcher. Save your money and opt for small electric lawn mowers instead!
customer_reviews.author: Mathieu Thouvenin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: Mowing a small yard lawn, it jammed up halfway through the process. Metal parts clashed together, and would no longer work. Probably will buy any more product from this company. Too bad, I had hoped this would be my clean green solution, so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Reel Mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower was very easy to assemble! It isn't hard to push at all. You do have to make sure any small twigs or tree nuts are picked up because it doesn't go over them as a power mower would. It's so nice not having to fight trying to start a regular mower.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hopson McGee

customer_reviews.title: It makes my green heart happy.
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what it said it was. It cuts grass and other short plants just fine. However, it does have trouble with tall weeds. It also has a little trouble with getting jammed with sticks and sweet gum balls, but at least it doesn't sling out as projectiles. I don't have to worry about a pull start, storing gas, or changing spark plugs. It was also very reasonable priced. This product will not give you a perfectly manicured lawn, but it makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Great excercise. Yard looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my river camp property. No fuel needed. I enjoy it. Some days its a real workout, but that's why I got it. I can talk myself out of that walk, but the grass must be cut. 😉 Love the grass catcher. I'm using the grass clippings to rebuild parts of my riverbank that have washed away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with quality
customer_reviews.text: After my second use of this lawn mower, it started squeaking. I tried greasing it, using WD40 to lubricate and it still squeaks, I clean it after every use. I also bought one for my daughter and hers is squeaking also. The whole idea of buying this item was for the quiet and the ecofriendly idea of not using gasoline. After using it for a couple of months, the rear wheel housing has loosened up also. All in all I'm not really happy with the quality of this mower. Perhaps I should have done a little more research.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awful. Granted, I bought it Amazon Warehouse and it showed up with rusty blades. But it was loud, didn't cut well, and even locked up just running on grass a few times. It didn't come with the bag, which I was hoping to have. Regardless, I returned it and got a Scott's 16" one that works way better. I've seen a neighbor also struggle with their Sun Joe in the yard. Looked rough!
customer_reviews.author: FilmComposer

customer_reviews.title: Old Style, Good or Bad?
customer_reviews.text: In spite of my wanting to reduce my carbon footprint, this mower did not work on my bumpy, slightly hilly yard. If you have a level, flat yard, I'm sure it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ol' Huck

customer_reviews.title: Great Manual Mower
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mower. I have owned manual mowers before. I had to get a new one for a new location I live in now where I have a lawn to tend to again. I really like this lil mower. It really does a great job and it is very light weight. If your in the market for a manual mower, you would be most pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Cut the lawn and get a workout
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have a can of dw40 with you or this will be just as noisy as a motorized push mower. If you want to mow the lawn and get a workout at the same time this one works great. Use it at half cut when cutting taller grass
customer_reviews.author: Zed Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works very well every time
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous may be more work that the power mower but at least it works every time. The power mower had a problem with the gas in our area. Every single time my husband stated it up it would not start and he'd have to take it to the engine repair guy. So if you are having the same problem get the Sun Joe. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a manual
customer_reviews.text: Moves with ease, the catch needs to be emptied more frequently than I anticipated. Understandably doesn't make tight turns & I wish it could cut a little lower, but does cut at acceptable heights. Great for small yards.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is intended for!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cut weeds but slices through grass with ease. I have centipede grass in the south and we have a flat 1/3 acre lot so didn't need self propelled mower. If you have a small flat yard this mower will work well. So easy! No gas, pulling on a rope, checking oil, etc. All I do is grab and go!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not for smaller lawn areas
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to maneuver in small lawn areas, Kept tearing up at the seams of my sod, I had it set on the fourth setting. Grass was still a bit long. If there is a fence or edging around lawn, will not cut grass within approx. 6" from it.
customer_reviews.author: Geraine_2007

customer_reviews.title: There is a reason
customer_reviews.text: It is inexpensive and well...... It may do a good job on a perfectly flat manicured yard. For me, it doesn't seem to do the job. Add some money to your budget and get something that really works well.
customer_reviews.author: Alph

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wheels stopped turning after the 2nd us have to keep it lubed and push out the rust to get going smoothly The bag falls of with a bump and half the grass doesn’t even make it in to the bag. Then when you do empty the bag you have to fight with it to come off and there goes all the grass
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Creech

customer_reviews.title: Happy we purchased
customer_reviews.text: First time owning a push mower. A lot easier than i expected. The clippings basket is small and fills up quickly. Love that this does not take up a lot if space in our shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Manual Reel Mover Ever
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 20 years, I've owned many manual reel movers from many different manufacturers, and this is the best I've owned so far. Easy assembly, sturdily built and great cutting action. The grass catcher works very well. Most reviews for other brands usually mentioned that the grass catcher did not work properly and would fall off regularly. This grass catcher stays secure every time and, if installed correctly, will catch most of the grass cut. Very good product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: We just busted it out for the summer- and remembered why we don’t like it. The wheels don’t stay on and the clipping basket never would snap on. Not with the price for all the problems we’ve had with it
customer_reviews.author: Txtoartotn

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of money, time, and effort!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not. Happy. I used a push mower growing up, and the thing actually moved. Actually cut grass. This? This gets jammed on ANYTHING. I even de-twigged my yard first, as per other reviewers recommendations. A stick 1/8" diameter will jam this "mower." Any minute divot in your lawn, any particularly lush spots... Jam. I may return. So very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Wheel fell off, now it’s scrap metal
customer_reviews.text: Cut my grass TWICE and the wheel fell off. It’s mostly assembled in the factory so all the pieces and parts that were lost in the yard were unknown. It wasn’t even worth a replacement nor replacement parts, I went with another brand. It’s hard to maneuver with one wheel.
customer_reviews.author: K Dub

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I only'disliked that the first time I used it, the rubber on the push handle crumbled and fell partially off. Of course, that didn't affect the workability, but now I have no grip on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Great for a small smooth yard. It does not work well on uneven thick yard. Dulled blades easily... Buy a sharpening kit!
customer_reviews.author: Radar

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Piece of junk. Broke after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I push it it only cuts good on the left side. I have to make 2-3 passes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McAbee

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a house with a very small yard and this is perfect. Very easy to push and maneuver. Grass looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Almost A Good Mowert
customer_reviews.text: Although there are numerous height adjustments I could not find one that would just top off the blades. Also the flimsy grass catcher has to be adjusted so the grass does not fly out.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for very overgrown lawn
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Tried to use it on my overgrown lawn which doesn't work well so it's alot of work, bit it does work very well on regularly mowed lawn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but not great. Does not cut the grass evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Wheel fell off first time used
customer_reviews.text: I just put this together and used it last weekend and it fell about first time...worked good while it was all together but now I cant figure out how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this little mower
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mower! It is perfect for my smaller yard - plus I like saving the clippings for mulch. Its easy to maintain, easy to store, and easy to handle. Pam H
customer_reviews.author: Pam H

customer_reviews.title: Fine push mower
customer_reviews.text: Fine product. The bag fits well and catches about 75% of the clippings. My grass isn't dense, which I believe is why the mower doesn't cut as well as I'd like. I end up doing a few passes and it gets most of it. Great for a smaller yard. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Ward

customer_reviews.title: It just happens to work great. My first push mower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mower because my name is Joseph. It just happens to work great. My first push mower, I wouldn't really know any better.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Blabs a Lot

customer_reviews.title: No gasoline no electricity
customer_reviews.text: Its really user friendly and very portable. The blades are sharp and are adjustable to more than 4 levels. No electric nor the gasoline is needed. Only power needed is to push and that even you don’t need that much of a power. Overall great affordable machine.
customer_reviews.author: SAMARPAN

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Hard to figure out at first when my grass was too long. Eventually once it was cut once it became easy. Doesn't cut well on the edges and slopes. and rocks and mulch get stuck in the blades. Overall a good buy for a manual mower.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto Juarez

customer_reviews.title: A very good choice for small lawns
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this mower. My back yard is small, and my front yard is xeriscaped, so it's not too much of a chore, and nice not to have to deal with gasoline or an electric cord. It's easier to push than I anticipated, and very easy to maneuver. The noise level is even lower than my old electric, though it's not exactly silent. The grass catcher fills up pretty quickly. Assembly was quick and easy. Instructions are included on adjusting the cutter, but mine didn't need any adjustment out of the box. I would definitely recommend this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy set up, hand screws to install the push bar. Easy to adjust the cutting height. Overall very pleased. Did not check cutting quality with the enclosed paper strips, as i am satisfied that the cut is pretty even out of the crate.
customer_reviews.author: MSW

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It will cut grass with no issues. However, depending on how it's on the ground, branches will cause you to stop and move them out of the way in order to get it moving again. The bag is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: Omar R. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Junk
customer_reviews.text: The wheel broke off after the second use and my grass area is not very big
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Blades are not sharpened
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come sharpened and doesnt cut weeds. Easy to push and does cut shorter grass.
customer_reviews.author: jude galbo

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance because of price
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance to try it this type of mower because of price. Does great for my yard. I had to oil some parts early on to stop some screeching. Works fine if you don't run over sticks or really bumpy ground. Way easier to use than powered mower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mower works quite well for where I am and ...
customer_reviews.text: This mower works quite well for where I am and the size yard I have. The only complaint I have is that it make a loud squeaking noise when you are getting it set up to mow, and until it actually starts cutting grass.
customer_reviews.author: RMac89

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended mower.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mower! It is designed to be much easier to push with the larger wheels in front. The bag is very easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bowlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Cuts well, but twigs can get caught up in it and are a bit difficult to remove. Perfect for a little patch of grass.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: For small yards and minimal grass.
customer_reviews.text: The catch only holds a limited amount before it kicks back into the boded. Wish there was a deeper catch or a lip to hold the grass caught once cut.
customer_reviews.author: A.V.Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight,  not your grandfather's push mower
customer_reviews.text: Too light, needs single roller instead of 2 back wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not good for normal lawns, needs a flat surface with only one type of grass
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Good for small yards
customer_reviews.text: Cut regularly. It doesn't do well with overgrown grass. It's nice for small yards.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better for a small lawn
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t ask for a better tool for a small lawn
customer_reviews.author: Robby Corrado

customer_reviews.title: I fired my gardener!
customer_reviews.text: My 14-year old son loves this reel lawn mower! It's easy to assemble and easy to cut the grass. Over thick grass, he has to back up and go over again but it gets the job done and collects the grass clippings effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the $
customer_reviews.text: For the money it does the job for me. It isn't a precession machine and I suspect the gears are plastic. But for the money I am very pleased. Good exercise to.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Quandt

customer_reviews.title: It works excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for two weeks now, have only used it twice, and I have no complaints. It works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Precepts

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mower. It does a great job of cutting. Would recommend only using for a small yard (like my postage stamp). Like the other reviews say, you have to keep on top of the grass cutting because if the grass gets too long, this mower will just push it over, not cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Its self explanatory but directions are perfect if needed
customer_reviews.text: Takes all of 5 minutes to setup if that! Its self explanatory but directions are perfect if needed. Have to push but not much, works great. Weeds that are tall dont cut but everything else works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dawne G

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy ro push. Weighs almost nothing. Takes up very little space in our garage. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: DaveHman

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: It’s awful. If I could I’d return it. My 13 year old kept saying it was hard to work so then I tried. I have a small backyard and couldn’t even get 1/4 of it mowed and it’s jammed and won’t move.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the work out
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t cut, heavy to move around, gets stuck and caught on grass
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh490

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cut grass or anything
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cut grass..to hard to push. Has become a fixture in garage..had to buy a motor lawn mower
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Lets stop climate change
customer_reviews.text: It squeaks a lot but I like being eco friendly saving the environment in ways I can
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: great for small yards
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is that it leaves small areas of grass where the blades don't cut. I have to go over the area a few times before it does cut or I have to use the weed trimmer to get the missed grass. Maybe another blade can be added or make the blades a little wider might help.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to maneuver, a pain
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a screw upon arrival and was more difficult to maneuver than expected. Loud too. Was not pleased with the item and sold it after two uses. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Korval

customer_reviews.title: person powered
customer_reviews.text: After reading a bunch of reviews on reel mowers, I was hesitant to buy one. People say all this junk about how hard it is to push and how it gets caught on twigs... I have a smallish but twiggy lot. I had no problems. This little mower is great! Buy one and save the ozone layer.
customer_reviews.author: kscheu

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate
customer_reviews.text: Bolts holding the wheels on vibrate while mowing and come loose, letting the wheels wobble and will lock up at random. Tightening the bolts does not solve the issue. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Schurtz

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous costumer service
customer_reviews.text: I got the Sun Joe to use with my wholistic landscaping business. I received it missing parts. I called. Spoke immediately to a rep. that sent me the parts. I love this product. Fabulous costumer service. I’d totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great front throw lawn mower . Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my yard and cuts very straight !
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great lawnmower ! Easy to push , wide swath , no noise or smelly gas !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This mower really packs a punch..Made extremely well and heavy duty...I love it...No gas smell,,No vibration in my hands where I had surgery..I made a smart buy for once..
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mower for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great little push mower. The only negative is the catch basket only captures about half of the clippings. Well shipped and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: and the grass-catcher easily falls off the mower
customer_reviews.text: The mower is hard to push, doesn't cut grass well, and the grass-catcher easily falls off the mower.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the bagging option isn’t really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JTRAM

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this mower. It's perfect for my small back yard
customer_reviews.author: Carol Holtshouser

product_meta.title: Sun Joe MJ501M 18-Inch Manual Reel Mower w/Grass Catcher, Green/Black
product_meta.description: SEE JOE MOW. No messy gas; just an easy-to-use, lightweight, maneuverable and economical push reel mower. The Sun Joe MJ501M Reel Mower with Grass Catcher handles tough turf with ease and provides a quiet solution for any lawn. The MJ501M comes with a handy rear collection bag to help keep your yard nice and tidy. Powered by you, the Mow Joe MJ501M has an 18-inch wide cutting path and a 9 position height adjustment lever. Tailor cutting heights up to 2.44-inch so you are in complete control of your grass. The mower’s dual wheel design and sharp harden steel blades ensures accuracy and cutting efficiency. The Sun Joe Mow Joe comes with a 2-Year full warranty. Rust resistant deck
feature_bullets: REEL MOWER: Powered with a push, this manual mower’s 5 sharpened steel blades cut a crisp 18-inch path in a single pass — no gas, oil or electricity required
ADJUSTABLE: 9 position manual height adjustment for cutting heights up to 2. 44 in. deep
RAZOREEL: 5 durable steel blades swiftly slice through grass for precise cutting
MANEUVERABILITY: Dual wheel design and sharp harden steel blades ensures accuracy and cutting efficiency

WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED! : Your new reel mower is backed by the Snow Joe + Sun Joe Customer Promise. We will warrant new, powered products for two years from the date of purchase. NO QUESTIONS ASKED. Contact Snow Joe + Sun Joe customer support at 1-866-766-9563 for further assistance.
